attributes.additional_details:
We the people are ruled by CONSENT
WE NOW WITHDRAW ALL CONSENT ON ALL ACTS AND STATUTES that raise money for a GOVERNMENT that has no control over spending.
These Acts and Statutes are not lawful as we the PEOPLE DID NOT AND DO NOT CONSENT

The GOVERNMENT in place, has not been given POWER over the people it is put in place to serve the people.

The Government of the day NEEDS TO raise or address the issue
OF GETTING THE PEOPLES CONSENT
for ALL Acts and Statutes parliament,
WISH TO MAKE IF THEY INVOLVE FINES OR LEVIES TO THE PEOPLE they Govern

Without OUR CONSENT all acts and Statutes are unlawful
